languages.text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит — за исключением рядового Камиля Региаса. Не могу не отметить его выдающиеся верность и выдержку".
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
languages.original_text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит — за исключением рядового Камиля Региаса. Не могу не отметить его выдающиеся верность и выдержку".

traits.locale_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regis. I must mention his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regis. I must mention his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."
"The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

languages.text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen. Außer Soldat Camille Regias gab es keine Überlebenden. Ich muss seine außergewöhnliche Loyalität und Widerstandsfähigkeit loben."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen. Außer Soldat Camille Regias gab es keine Überlebenden. Ich muss seine außergewöhnliche Loyalität und Widerstandsfähigkeit loben."

languages.text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade. Il n'y a eu aucun survivant à part le soldat Camille Regias. Je dois saluer sa loyauté et sa ténacité extraordinaires. »
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade. Il n'y a eu aucun survivant à part le soldat Camille Regias. Je dois saluer sa loyauté et sa ténacité extraordinaires. »

languages.text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。只有列兵科米尔·雷贾斯活了下来，我必须表扬他非凡的忠诚与坚韧。”
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。只有列兵科米尔·雷贾斯活了下来，我必须表扬他非凡的忠诚与坚韧。”

languages.text: 「護衛隊は襲撃を受けた。兵卒カミーユ・レジアス以外に生存者はいない。彼の並外れた忠誠心と回復力を称えなければな」
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛隊は襲撃を受けた。兵卒カミーユ・レジアス以外に生存者はいない。彼の並外れた忠誠心と回復力を称えなければな」

languages.text: «El convoy fue emboscado. No hubo supervivientes, salvo el soldado Camille Regias. Debo alabar su lealtad y resistencia».
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: «El convoy fue emboscado. No hubo supervivientes, salvo el soldado Camille Regias. Debo alabar su lealtad y resistencia.

languages.text: "Konvoy pusuya düşürülmüş. İçlerinde Er Camille Regias hariç sağ kalan yoktu. Olağanüstü sadakatini ve direncini ne kadar övsem az."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed. There were no survivors except Private Camille Regias. I must commend his extraordinary loyalty and resilience."

traits.locale_text: "Konvoy pusuya düşürülmüş. İçlerinde Er Camille Regias hariç sağ kalan yoktu. Olağanüstü sadakatini ve direncini ne kadar övsem az."
